name: Learn to Code
body:
### Welcome Testers to "Learn to Code" app testing page
Rock Valley College’s Computer Information Systems is celebrating National Computer Science Week by joining many other institutions across the US and hosting an “Hour of Code" event.  This event will take place at the Woodward Technology Center (WTC) on Saturday Dec 12 in room WTC152.

![Learn to Code App](http://i59.tinypic.com/1zyc8zt.png)

### Requirements
1) iOS iPhone of iPad with iOS version 9.0 or later
2) The UDID of iPhone or iPad. Visit http://udid.io from iOS device. Accept all prompts and email UDID to ckonkol@gmail.com
3) Email Chuck Konkol @ ckonkol@gmail.com and state you want to test this app
4) Wait to hear back from Chuck Konkol via email before testing

### Authors and Contributors
Chuck Konkol
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
